name: Alpha Squirrel
description:
You're the best squirrel in the forest. You are Alpha Squirrel. But the forest is on fire and you must rescue your stranded friends from the flames.

You can dash and jump through the fire but don't linger or you'll singe your tail.

Collect acorns for bonus points!

Play time 5-10 minutes.

Made for Games Plus Jam 2021

Follow me on Twitter
